<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_58872_needit_needit</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>NeedIt When needed field date</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    var selectedDate = new GlideDateTime(current.whenNeeded); // Replace 'date_field' with the actual name of your date field
    var currentDate = new GlideDateTime();

    // Check if the selected date is in the past
    if (selectedDate.before(currentDate)) {
        current.setAbortAction(true); // Prevents the record from being saved
        gs.addErrorMessage('You cannot select a date in the past.'); // Displays an error message
    }

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-15 12:33:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f62759f347424210db239dbe316d43bd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedIt When needed field date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f62759f347424210db239dbe316d43bd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-15 13:29:22</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f62759f347424210db239dbe316d43bd"/></record_update>
